law.catch_line: Mortgage for building or improvement purposes to state facts -- Misapplication of proceeds.

text.section: Any mortgage taken to secure a loan made for the purpose of erecting, improving or adding to a building shall state such facts.
No person shall willfully misappropriate or misapply the proceeds received from such a loan.

law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2467.
